German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈʁaɪ̯zə/
  • Rhymes: -aɪ̯zə
  • Audio
    		(file)
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)

Etymology 1[edit]

From Middle High German reise, reis, from Old High German reisa, from Proto-Germanic *raisō. Cognate with English reys (“journey, travel”).

Noun[edit]

Reise f (genitive Reise, plural Reisen)

  1. journey, travel
  2. trip (on drugs)
